title: About P(Public)B(Beta)E(Enviroment)

embed.description: Hello Summoners, PBE signups are closed until further notice. The website has been in a poorly functioning state for a while now and we are trying to address all the problems at once instead of throwing a band-aid over it.

body: PBE sign-ups are closed for mainentance for about 2 months..A lot of players want to have a PBE account but any of them can..So does anyone know When the signups will open again?I am also one of them and i cant wait till it opens again..I sign-up before it closed and i didnt got any e-mail for 1 year now i made a new account and i want to sign up so much.If anyone know when it opens again comment bellow..Thanks{{item:3073}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Hey C9 Syth,

At this time, we don't have an ETA for opening sign ups. There are several things we're still figuring out on the back end of things, but, we'll be sure to post when sign ups are back up and running!
